<<<<<<< HEAD
CSS.AllowImportant
TYPE: bool
DEFAULT: false
VERSION: 3.1.0
--DESCRIPTION--
This parameter determines whether or not !important cascade modifiers should
be allowed in user CSS. If false, !important will stripped.
--# vim: et sw=4 sts=4
=======
CSS.AllowImportant
TYPE: bool
DEFAULT: false
VERSION: 3.1.0
--DESCRIPTION--
This parameter determines whether or not !important cascade modifiers should
be allowed in user CSS. If false, !important will stripped.
--# vim: et sw=4 sts=4
